com.zenon.sdk.core

Class CallManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Handler
      • com.zenon.sdk.core.CallManager

  • public class CallManager
extends Handler
    This class controls the call signaling and media initiation, maintianence and termination
    Version:
    ZenonSDKv1.0
    Author:
    Pankaj Sharma (pankajs@requestec.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static CallManager getInstance()
        Retrieve an instance of Call Manager
        Parameters:
        void -
        Returns:

      • placeCall

        public void placeCall(int call_type,
             java.lang.String contacts,
             java.lang.String session_id,
             java.lang.String call_Id,
             PendingIntent pendingIntent)
        Initiate a Voice/Video Call over the Zenon framework
        Parameters:
        call_type - Type of Call (Video/Voice). This is taken from UserConstants
        contacts - This is the list of contactid and lineNumbers in a comma separated format (e.g. a@b.com#1, c@d.com#2, e@f.com#3)
        session_id - A unique identifier at the app layer to identify the newly created call session
        call_Id - A unique identifier for the call. This will not change for until call exists.
        pendingIntent - This is a pending Intent required to handle the Incoming Call messages in the Media Plane
        See Also:
        UserConstants

      • handleMessage

        public void handleMessage(Message msg)
        Message handler for handling call events from within Zenon Framework
        Parameters:
        msg - Messenger service message depicting type of call event to be serviced by CallManager

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        void

        public void acceptIncomingCall(java.lang.String lineNumber)
        Accept an incoming Voice/Video Call
        Parameters:
